programme.desc: Esma-i Husna programı Allahın guzel isimlerini ekrana taşıyor. Allahın guzel isimlerinin anlamlarını ve derinliğini sizlerle paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Mukabele
programme.desc: Kuran-ı Kerimden her gun bir cuzun okunduğu programda, her ay Kuran-ı Kerimin tamamı hatmediliyor. Mukabele, izleyicilere Kuran-ı Kerimi okumayı ve anlamayı oğretiyor.

programme.title: Diyanete Soralım
programme.desc: Aklınıza takılan soruları her bolumde işin uzmanına soruyoruz.

programme.title: Şeker Hoca
programme.desc: Nasreddin Hocanın birbirinden eğlenceli maceraları ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Neşe İstasyonu
programme.desc: Neşe İstasyonunda yarışmalarla eğleniyor, bilgimize bilgi katıyor ve birlikte renkli hayallere dalıyoruz! Neşe dolu bir dunya sizleri bekliyor!

programme.title: Ömre Bedel
programme.desc: Ne yaşarsa yaşasın inancını kaybetmemiş, sahip olduklarının kıymetini bilmiş, Allah’a olan inancını hep içinde taşıyarak şukretmesini bilmiş insanların ibretlik yaşam oykuleri ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Namaz Ve Hayat
programme.desc: Hayat; kimini zor şartlarla sınar. Kimini zamanla yarıştırır.Ve bu hayatta asıl kazananlar; zamana kapılmadan, şartlara esir olmadan vaktin peşinde olanlardır.

programme.title: Anadolunun İzleri
programme.desc: Sabır, vefa, durustluk gibi kavramları yaşamlarında tatbik eden, Anadolu irfanı ile yoğrulmuş kişilerin yaşam oykusu konu alınıyor.

programme.title: İlmihal
programme.desc: İlmihal programı, Allaha, kendimize ve topluma olan sorumluluklarımızı hatırlatıyor. İbadetleri, sosyal ve gunluk hayata dair konuları dini ve fıkhi boyutuyla, ilmihal ışığında değerlendiriyor.

programme.title: Mukabele
programme.desc: Kuran-ı Kerimden her gun bir cuzun okunduğu programda, her ay Kuran-ı Kerimin tamamı hatmediliyor. Mukabele, izleyicilere Kuran-ı Kerimi okumayı ve anlamayı oğretiyor.

programme.title: Din ve Psikoloji
programme.desc: Dinin insan hayatındaki etki ve boyutlarının konuşulduğu, insanın iç dunyasına doğru bir yuruyuşun gerçekleştirildiği program, uzman konuklar eşliğinde ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Riyazus Salihin Okumaları
programme.desc: Prof. Dr. Halil İbrahim Kutlayın anlatımı ile İmam Nevevi tarafından kaleme alınan Riyâzus Sâlihîn eserinin okumaları yapılıyor.

programme.title: İşaret Dili ile Kuran
programme.desc: İşitme engelli olmak vahyi duymaya engel değildir. Sadâları kulaklar duymasa da Kur’an-ı Kerim’i yurekler işitir.

programme.title: Bil Bakalım Avrupa
programme.desc: Avrupanın çeşitli ulkelerinde yaşayan gurbetçilerimizle yapılan bilgi yarışması ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Diyanet Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gun içinde yaşanan gelişmeler, gundemde yer alan konular izleyicilere aktarılıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, kulturden sanata Turkiye ve dunya gundemine ilişkin onemli gelişmeler ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Esma-i Husna
programme.desc: Esma-i Husna programı Allahın guzel isimlerini ekrana taşıyor. Allahın guzel isimlerinin anlamlarını ve derinliğini sizlerle paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Eşsiz Sanat
programme.desc: Eşsiz Sanat, Allahın sonsuz yaratma kudreti ve var etme hikmeti ekranlara taşıyor.

programme.title: Bir Sahaf Bin Dunya
programme.desc: Her bolumde kendi mesleklerinde one çıkmış sahafların dunyası, birer kultur elçisi olarak bugune taşıdıkları anlatılıyor.

programme.title: Rahmet Elçileri
programme.desc: İnsanlığın kurtuluşu için gonderilen Adem (AS)den Hz. Muhammed Mustafa (SAS)ya kadar gelen tum rahmet elçilerinin ibret dolu hayatları ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Değer Ve İnsan
programme.desc: Her bolumde ahlaki değerlerimizden biri anlatılıyor.

programme.title: Namaz
programme.desc: Adabından mekruh, sunnet ve vaciplerine kadar her yonuyle ve tatbikiyle namaz hakkında bilinmesi gerekenler ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Duşuncenin Özu
programme.desc: İslami ilimlerin ana konularından guncel dini meselelere, populer kulturden akademinin gundemdeki tartışmalarına kadar birçok mesele ele alınıyor. Programda, insanı anlamayı ve kavramları yeniden konuşmayı hedefleyen ilim insanlarıyla bir duşunce yolculuğuna çıkılıyor.

programme.title: Ecdadın Emaneti Ayasofya Camileri
programme.desc: Bazen şehrin en buyuk camisi, bazen fethin nişanesi, ulkemizin dort bir yanından Ayasofyaya nazire olarak bu şekilde isimlendirilen Ayasofya camilerinin tarihi ve kulturel değerleri konu alınıyor.

programme.title: Aşr-ı Şerif
programme.desc: Her bolumde Kuran-ı Kerimden onar ayetin okunduğu programda, izleyicileri Kuran ziyafeti yaşatılıyor.

programme.title: Yeni Gune Merhaba

programme.title: Vehicles
programme.desc: In this bright, stimulating cartoon, young children can learn how many different modes of transport work. Not only will they widen their knowledge on transport, they will be entertained and engaged throughout. As is the case with many Duck TV productions, the aim is to entertain and educate. Children will also be encouraged to identify shapes and colours, essential for development.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Oli - The Cycles of Nature
programme.desc: Give your child a head start, in a way thats fun and exciting, too. Oli the elephant will teach your child to identify objects and their uses in everyday life, develop their thinking and observational skills, and also he will promote an interest in nature. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid the development of young children.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: The Way We Travel

Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Planet Jumpers
programme.desc: Planet Jumpers is a series set in the future, in space. Through the everyday life of the siblings Luna and Lou we get to know different planets, funky futuristic objects and places while developing the socialization skills of our preschooler viewers.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo PLUS
programme.desc: Join the two familiar characters who have become preschoolers but still love fun adventures which teach them about various useful things. In their amazing adventures, Mimo and Bobo learn about friendship, sharing, helping others and more, helping children develop their social and observational skills.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Vege-tales

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Sea Adventure

programme.title: Nature Dudes

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Sounds Around Us

They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy 2
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy are here to introduce little children to the concept of rhythm. The familiar duo go on many exciting adventures in which they encounter amazing animals who help them explore the wonderful world of rhythm through their clapping and tapping.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: As is the case with many Duck TV programmes, this programme is designed to both educate and entertain its young audience. This cartoon takes a look into the lives of a range of the cutest baby animals, and explores their family relationships. The cartoon develops social skills and understanding family relationships, alongside improving the ability to recognise different animals, too.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Hubbi Will Take Care of It
programme.desc: Hubbi hippo, Matti beaver and Milo and the ultimate DIY trio, no task is too great for this ferocious three. They are determined to fix everything, helping everyone they meet along the way. No job is too big for this group of friends. This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo PLUS
programme.desc: Join the two familiar characters who have become preschoolers but still love fun adventures which teach them about various useful things. In their amazing adventures, Mimo and Bobo learn about friendship, sharing, helping others and more, helping children develop their social and observational skills.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. Th cartoon stimulates childrens imagination and creativity, and it also has got tranquil sweet tunes that follow every adventure.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy 2
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy are here to introduce little children to the concept of rhythm. The familiar duo go on many exciting adventures in which they encounter amazing animals who help them explore the wonderful world of rhythm through their clapping and tapping.

programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Partners in Fun
programme.desc: Go on countless adventures and mess around with this adorable duo. Join a baby monkey and bear-cub as they play around, making friends and having fun. Young viewers can develop their social skills and learn about the value of friendship whilst experiencing lots of different adventures. Get your little one to interact with the show by identifying colours as they come onto the screen for extra learning.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy

Stories are created with the support of child psychologists to help children adjust to the arrival of a new sibling.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! programme.title: Vege-tales

programme.title: Henrys Stories

programme.title: Tempo Giusto

Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The Shapies are here to show younger audiences to the world of shapes on fun adventures! Showing us where they fit in and what they resemble, The Shapies will enable toddlers to recognise shapes!

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends

The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo PLUS
programme.desc: Join the two familiar characters who have become preschoolers but still love fun adventures which teach them about various useful things. In their amazing adventures, Mimo and Bobo learn about friendship, sharing, helping others and more, helping children develop their social and observational skills.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: World of Toys
programme.desc: Enter a world of games and experience with us fantastic adventures or exercise your fingers and conjure up some exquisite art jewellery. No manuals are needed to do this. Create your own special story and discover new possibilities how to spend a moment together.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends

programme.title: Risto Gusto
programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. Th cartoon stimulates childrens imagination and creativity, and it also has got tranquil sweet tunes that follow every adventure.

programme.title: Doll Team

The three friends are determined to help the inhabitants of the undergrowth however they can.

programme.title: Shaping Up

Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Oli - The Cycles of Nature
programme.desc: Give your child a head start, in a way thats fun and exciting, too. Oli the elephant will teach your child to identify objects and their uses in everyday life, develop their thinking and observational skills, and also he will promote an interest in nature. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid the development of young children.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

In order to reopen the zoo to the public, they will renovate it completely with the help of the zoo staff lead by an attractive 28-year-old woman named Kelly Foster.

programme.title: This Day In History
programme.desc: This Day In History is a documentary series that looks back at historic events that took place on this day. We explore many different events that have had a lasting impact on society, whether in sport, politics, entertainment, art or science. Each episode is split into three parts, each featuring a short story about the event, letting viewers learn new English words and about fascinating pieces of history.

programme.title: Gadget-X: Choosing between tablet, desktop and laptop
programme.desc: Find solutions for everyday problems by using the best and newest gadgets, and practise your English, learn names of different devices, their main features and applications.

programme.title: English 911: IF I WERE YOU versus IF I WAS YOU, IN SPITE OF versus DESPITE, ACCORDINGLY versus CORRESPONDINGLY
programme.desc: In this episode: 1) IF I WERE YOU versus IF I WAS YOU; 2) IN SPITE OF versus DESPITE; 3) ACCORDINGLY versus CORRESPONDINGLY.

programme.title: English 911: THREAT versus THREATEN, the difference between: COUNCIL / COUNSEL/ CONSUL, FALL versus AUTUMN
programme.desc: In this episode: 1) THREAT versus THREATEN; 2) the difference between: COUNCIL / COUNSEL/ CONSUL; 3) FALL versus AUTUMN.

programme.title: English 911: ENVELOPE versus ENVELOP, JOB versus WORK, ALTOGETHER versus ALL TOGETHER
programme.desc: In this episode: 1) ENVELOPE versus ENVELOP; 2) JOB versus WORK; 3) ALTOGETHER versus ALL TOGETHER.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Time has changed, as well as the things that surround us. Some things have disappeared forever, some have been transformed beyond recognition and others have begun to have different uses. In this episode, curious facts from the history of pens.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Animation, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and Will Forte. A clever scientist gets hired by his idol, the great Chester V, after he invented a machine that turns water into food, but he soon discovers that his creation is still in action but now creates animal/vegetable hybrids.

programme.title: Here and There
programme.desc: Here and There is an educational programme that reveals interesting facts and tells about different events. The host of the programme uses easily understandable language. The viewers at these levels have no difficulty in following the presenters speech. The show can help you boost your vocabulary.

programme.title: Easy Talk
programme.desc: Easy Talk _ a series of animated films organized into several thematic blocks, for those who want to improve their spoken English and learn many useful expressions and vocabulary units.

programme.title: Easy Talk
programme.desc: Every TV viewer knows that TV programmes often provide answers to popular questions and can suggest solutions to some problems. But will a popular beauty show help our character to achieve the desired result? Lets see.

programme.title: Wrongandright
programme.desc: WrongandRight _ is a series of short animated videos that will show you the most common mistakes in English grammar, phonetics and vocabulary and help you avoid them in your own speech.

programme.title: English United
programme.desc: Creative American teacher and blogger Luke Priddy introduces the intricacies of the American English and the cultural specifics of the United States.

programme.title: English United
programme.desc: Creative American teacher and blogger Luke Priddy introduces the intricacies of the American English and the cultural specifics of the United States.

programme.title: 3Ways2: Apologise
programme.desc: 3Ways2 is a programme for those who are keen to master various stylistic layers of the English language to express thoughts appropriately depending on the situation.

programme.title: English In Focus: Idiomatic expressions with the noun "Plate"
programme.desc: The project "English in Focus" is aimed at specifying the shades of meaning and usage peculiarities of various confusing lexical units and grammar constructions.

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: We Bought a Zoo (2011) is a family comedy-drama directed by Cameron Crowe and starring Matt Damon and Scarlett Johansson. The family of Mee spends their last dime on a house with an old abandoned zoo. To save its inhabitants from extinction, the whole family will have to make a great effort. In order to reopen the zoo to the public, they will renovate it completely with the help of the zoo staff lead by an attractive 28-year-old woman named Kelly Foster.

programme.title: Basketbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Discover all the stories that make it to the pages, including news from politics, entertainment, environment, business and more. The presenters review these press headlines and offer details about the stories.

programme.title: Tekrar
programme.desc: Kanal 33un "Tekrar" kuşağı, gun içerisinde yayınlanan programları kaçıran izleyiciler için yeniden ekrana taşıyor. Haber bultenlerinden soyleşi programlarına, kultur-sanat içeriklerinden tartışma ve analizlere kadar birçok yayın, tekrar kuşağında izleyiciyle buluşuyor.

programme.title: Kanal 7de Sabah
programme.desc: Kultur, sanat ve politikada yaşananlar, medya ve siyaset dunyasının onde gelen isimlerinin yaptığı açıklamalar, gundemi belirleyen konular ve olaylar, gazete haberleri, manşetler ve anlık gelişmeler, Turkiye ve dunyada olup bitenler ilkeli habercilik anlayışıyla hareket eden Kanal 7 de Sabah ile ekranlara geliyor. Kanal 7de Sabah toplumsal olayları, siyasi meseleleri, hayata dair çarpıcı olayları ve en guncel haberleri Esra Ketencinin sunumuyla ekranlara taşıyor.

programme.title: Elif
programme.desc: Macera dolu sahneleriyle soluk soluğa izlenen Elifte Melek nihayet kızına kavuşur. Uzun uğraşlar sonucu birbirini Haktanırlar konağında bulan Melek ve Elif konaktan ayrılmaya karar verir. Tam konaktan ayrılacakları esnada Tarıkın adamı onları yakalar ve Meleki vurur. Elifi kaçırmak uzereyken Melek mudahale eder ve kızını adamın elinden kurtarır. Elifi de alıp kimsenin bilmediği bir yerde yeni bir hayat kurmak isteyen Melek izini kaybettirmeyi başarır.

programme.title: Golgenin Kıyısında
programme.desc: Gucun ve entrikanın golgesinde kalan Falak ve Taimoorun sınavlarla dolu hikayesi "Golgenin Kıyısında" hafta içi her gun 14:15te Kanal 7de.

programme.title: Kanal 7 Haber Saati
programme.desc: Tumer Doğrunun sunumuyla ekrana gelen Kanal 7 Haber Saati, Haber Merkezinin guçlu ekibi tarafından hazırlanırken gundemdeki gelişmelere ayrıntılı ve en doğru şekilde yer veriyor. Turkiye ve dunyada yaşanan en son gelişmeleri, siyasetin nabzını sıcağı sıcağına Kanal 7 Haber Saati aracılığıyla izleyiciye aktarıyor.

programme.title: Gir Dunyama
programme.desc: Sevilmek için kalbini ortaya koyan Kuhu ve gorduğu guzelliğin peşinden suruklenen Rajeevin çarpıcı hikâyesi Gir Dunyama ile hafta içi her gun 21:15te Kanal 7de.

programme.title: Kan Çiçekleri
programme.desc: Kardeşini toreye kurban vermek istemeyen Baran ve tum hayallerini bir kenara koyup hiç tanımadığı biriyle evlenen Dilanın kanla yoğurulan zoraki evlilikleri Kan Çiçekleri, tekrar bolumleri ile her gun 24.50de Kanal 7de!

Turkiye ve dunyada yaşanan en son gelişmeleri, siyasetin nabzını sıcağı sıcağına Kanal 7 Haber Saati aracılığıyla izleyiciye aktarıyor.

programme.title: Kan Çiçekleri
programme.desc: Kardeşini toreye kurban vermek istemeyen Baran ve tum hayallerini bir kenara koyup hiç tanımadığı biriyle evlenen Dilanın kanla yoğurulan zoraki evlilikleri Kan Çiçekleri, tekrar bolumleri ile her gun 24.50de Kanal 7de!

programme.title: Poyraz Karayel
programme.desc: Aşkın ve nefretin, dostluğun ve duşmanlığın, iyiliğin ve kotuluğun en uçlarda yaşandığı bir hikaye...

programme.title: Baht Oyunu
programme.desc: Yaygın bir inanıştır; aşkın peşinde koşan yakalayamaz, yakalanır! Ve doğru adamla hep yanlış yerde, yanlış zamanda karşılaşılır. Peki hep boyle midir? Baht oyunu, ilk aşkıyla mutluluğu yakalayamazsa sonsuza kadar mutsuz olacağına inanan bir genç kızın hikayesini izleyicilerle buluşturuyor.

programme.title: Öyle Bir Geçer Zaman Ki
programme.desc: Hikaye, 1967 yılında, İstanbul’un eski semtlerinden birinde başlayan ve gunumuze kadar surecek olan bir zamanı dilimini içeriyor. 1960lı yıllarda, kocasının kendisine yaptığı onca kotuluğu ve yaşadığı aile dramını unutamamış, bir evladını torununun doğumunda kaybetmiş bir annenin ve aynı zamanda kendisine ait bir konfeksiyon atolyesinin sahibi olan Cemilenin, kızları Berrin ve Aylin; oğulları Mete ve Osman, kayınvalidesi Hasefe Hanım, damatları ve torunları ile verdiği mucadeleye tanık olacaksınız.

programme.title: Neler Oluyor Hayatta
programme.desc: Yorumlarıyla fark yaratan Hakan Ural ve Ferda Yıldırım, gundeme ve insana dair her konuya değiniyor.

programme.title: Yaprak Dokumu
programme.desc: Butun hayatını beş çocuğuna iyi bir ahlak vermeye adayan Ali Rıza Bey, bir haksızlığa goz yumması istenince kaymakamlık gorevinden istifa eder. Kızları Neclanın da universiteyi kazanmasıyla Ali Rıza Bey ve ailesi İstanbula yerleşmeye karar verir. Fakat Ali Rıza Bey, doğup buyuduğu şehri çok değişmiş bulur. Bu farklı çevrede çocukların istekleri de değişmeye başlamıştır. Buyuk şehir hayatının getirdiği ekonomik krizler kaçınılmazdır. Ali Rıza Bey, ekonomik gucuyle birlikte otoritesini de kaybetmiştir. Darbeler ardarda gelir. Ruzgar sert esmekte, ağacın yaprakları birer birer dokulmektedir...

programme.title: Gelinim Mutfakta
programme.desc: Aslı Hunelin sunumuyla ekrana gelen Gelinim Mutfakta, yine çok kazandırmaya devam ediyor. Gelinler her gun 1 çeyrek altın kazanırken, haftanın en başarılı gelini ise 10 altın bileziğin sahibi oluyor.

programme.title: Arka Sokaklar
programme.desc: İstanbul Polis Teşkilatı Asayiş Şube’de gorev yapan sivil bir ekip, minibusleriyle İstanbulun sokaklarını arşınlamakta ve karşılarına çıkan her turlu kanunsuzlukla savaşmaktadırlar.

programme.title: Kanal D Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gundemin nabzının tutulduğu ve son dakika gelişmelerinin ekrana aktarıldığı Kanal D Ana Haber, Deniz Bayramoğlu’nun sunumuyla ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Uzak Şehir
programme.desc: Cihanın Boranın hayatta olduğunu gizlemek için verdiği mucadele her geçen gun daha da ağır bir sınava donuşur. Bu gerçeği oğrenen Alya, Cihana duyduğu guvenin sarsılmasıyla derin bir ikilem yaşar. Cihan, tum samimiyetiyle kendini anlatmaya çalışır. İkili, bu buyuk sınavı birlikte goğuslemeye karar verdiklerinde ise karşılarına hiç beklemedikleri bir engel çıkar: Sadakat.

programme.title: Eşref Ruya
programme.desc: Taylanın son nefesinde Eşrefi işaret etmesi, onu doğrudan şupheli konumuna duşurur. Dinçer, Nisan ile Eşrefin arasını açmak için planını bir adım oteye taşımaya kararlıdır. Bu sırada Gurdalın ortadan kaybolması, ekip içinde giderek artan bir endişeye yol açar. Kadir, Gurdalı kullanarak Eşrefi koşeye sıkıştırmayı planlar. Eşref ise bir yandan sevdiklerini korumaya çalışırken, diğer yandan kendisine yonelen şuphelerle baş etmek durumunda kalır.

programme.title: Poyraz Karayel
programme.desc: Aşkın ve nefretin, dostluğun ve duşmanlığın, iyiliğin ve kotuluğun en uçlarda yaşandığı bir hikaye...

programme.title: Kuzey Guney
programme.desc: Kuzey ve Guney, pusuladaki iki farklı yon gibi, karakterleri ve hayalleriyle de farklı iki kardeştir. Birbirlerine olan bağlılıkları dışında tek ortak noktalarıysa, babaları Sami’nin işlettiği simit fırınına sığamayacak kadar buyuk hayallerinin olmasıdır. Ancak iki kardeşin hayallerinin gerçeğe donuşebilmesi için kaderlerini de değiştirmeleri gerekecektir.

programme.title: Öyle Bir Geçer Zaman Ki
programme.desc: Hikaye, 1967 yılında, İstanbul’un eski semtlerinden birinde başlayan ve gunumuze kadar surecek olan bir zamanı dilimini içeriyor. 1960lı yıllarda, kocasının kendisine yaptığı onca kotuluğu ve yaşadığı aile dramını unutamamış, bir evladını torununun doğumunda kaybetmiş bir annenin ve aynı zamanda kendisine ait bir konfeksiyon atolyesinin sahibi olan Cemilenin, kızları Berrin ve Aylin; oğulları Mete ve Osman, kayınvalidesi Hasefe Hanım, damatları ve torunları ile verdiği mucadeleye tanık olacaksınız.

programme.title: Arka Sokaklar
programme.desc: Cevher Aliyi pis işlerinde kullanmaya devam etmektedir. Öldurulen Samuelin eşi Monika kocasının intikamını almak için tam bir olum makinasına donuşmuştur. Husnuyu hayata dondurmek için doktorlar ellerinden geleni yapar ama bir noktadan sonra onlar da çaresiz kalmıştır.

programme.title: Gundem Özel
programme.desc: Gundemin nabzını tutan, uzman konukları ve tarafsız yorumlarıyla one çıkan haber programı: Gundem Özel.

programme.title: Dizi Kuşağı
programme.desc: Bir sonraki bolumu tatmin edici bir beklenti ve istekle izleyebilmeniz için dizi size belirsizlik ve kuçuk bir doz coşku verecektir.

programme.title: Gizem Çetin ile KRT Ana Haber
Gizem Çetin ile KRT Ana Haber
Şaşırtıcı Hayvan Dostlukları
programme.desc: Atlara fısıldama da yetenekli olduğu ortaya çıkan Danua cinsi bir kopek olan “Çiftlik muduru” Barclay dahil, yeni Şaşırtıcı Hayvan Dostlar ile tanışın. Afrikada Thor adındaki minik bir ipek maymunu, kurtarılmış olan iki firavunfaresine takıntılı biçimde bağlı.

programme.title: Mercan Şehri
programme.desc: Romantizmin ve goçmen yolcuların mercan resifinin ana otoyollarını doldurduğu, dalgaların altında yatan en fantastik şehri keşfedin. Aşkı arayan bir yeşil deniz kaplumbağasını izleyip yeni doğmuş yavrularına bakan baba deve kuşuna eşlik edin.

programme.title: Mercan Şehri
programme.desc: Devasa deniz salyangozları mercan avındaki deniz yıldızları çetesini savuştururken olanca sıcaklığıyla yazın gelişini hissedin. Avlarına sinsice yaklaşan kopekbalıklarına eşlik edip papağan balığının hayatta kalmak için burunduğu kılıklara şaşırın.

programme.title: Mercan Şehri
programme.desc: Yuksek sıcaklıklar hayatta kalmayı zorlaştırdığından ortama uyum sağlayacak ya da oleceksiniz. Önce bir palyaço balığı ailesi ile denizşakayığı ev sahiplerine konuk olun sonra da temizleyici balıkların vatozlara yaşattığı spa keyfine tanıklık edin.

programme.title: Mercan Şehri
programme.desc: Hareketli resiflerde bastıran kışla yavaşlayan yaşama konuk olun.Kopekbalıkları ve ahtapotlarla dolaşıp bir gemi enkazındaki mercan vahasını ziyaret edin. Tam bir avcı gorunumune burunen çizgili yılan balığının kılık değiştirme becerisine şaşırın.

programme.title: Tuhaf Canlılar
programme.desc: Dunyanın en azılı boceklerinden bazılarıyla birlikte surunun. Dev hamamboceklerinin uzun yaşam için bağışıklık sistemlerini geliştirmelerini izleyin. Ardından dev kırkayakların zehirlemedeki hunerlerine ve dev dikenleri olan boceklerin gorunmezlik zırhlarına goz atın.

programme.title: Kuzey Amerikanın Derinlikleri
programme.desc: Kemerlerinizi bağlayın ve Alaska vahşi yaşamıyla tanışmak için Lizzie ile heyecan verici bir uçak yolculuğu yapın. Bilim adamlarıyla kutbun sualtı sakinlerinin sohbetlerine kulak verin, kutup ayılarıyla yemek yiyip ak tepeli kartallarla avlanın.

programme.title: Kuzey Amerikanın Derinlikleri
programme.desc: Lizzie ile Kuzey Amerika kıyılarındaki vahşi yaşamı deneyimleyip devasa kelp ormanlarını keşfedin. Kanada yağmur ormanlarında baş dondurucu kızılçam ağaçlarına bakın. Somonlar yumurtlamak için yukarıya yuzerken kurtlar ve ayılarla yuz yuze gelin.

programme.title: Derine Dalış Avustralya
programme.desc: Gezinin son turunu Avustralyanın iç kesimindeki çolun, sıcak ve çetin Hint Okyanusu ile buluştuğu vahşi topraklarda tamamlayın. Lizzie kaplan kopekbalıkları, manta vatozları ve goçebe kaplumbağalarla dalış yaparken bu bolgede hayatta kalmanın zorluklarıyla yuzleşin.

programme.title: Bizim Gibi Hayvanlar
programme.desc: Kenyada aslan yavrularını yetiştirmek için neden butun bir koyun çalışması gerektiğini keşfedin ve Madagaskardaki kokulu lemurların çiftleşme stratejisini koklayarak keşfedin. Bir bal arısı dans partisinde kurtlarınızı dokun, ardından çatal kuyruklu bir drongonun diğer kuşları kaldırarak akşam yemeklerini nasıl çaldığını dinleyin.

programme.title: Bizim Gibi Hayvanlar
programme.desc: Kopekbalıklarının dişlerinin inci beyazlığını korumalarına yardımcı olan dişlek balıklara hayran kalın ve yunus ailelerinin kendilerine ozgu çağrılarını keşfedin. Kapuçin maymunlarının fındık kıran taş aletlerini inceleyin, zurafalar birbirine sokulurken içiniz ısınsın ve bir mirket gangsteriyle tanışın.

programme.title: Muson Adaları
programme.desc: Yala Ulusal Parkının golgeli ormanları, gizemli leoparlar için mukemmel bir sığınaktır. Genç bir kadın olan Ashanın tek başına yola koyulma vakti gelmiştir. Kendi bolgesi için savaşırken, bir eş bulurken ve anne olurken ona katılın.

programme.title: Uçlardaki Afrika
programme.desc: Etiyopyadaki Simien Dağları Milli Parkı dunyadaki en nadir canlılardan bazılarına ev sahipliği yapıyor. Afrikanın en yuksek zirvelerinden bazılarında, kaba tuylu, otlakta otlanan jeladalar, bulunması zor Simien kurtları ve boynuzlu Walia dağ keçisinin son kalesinde yaşayan canlıların yaşamına goz atın.

programme.title: Tuhaf Canlılar
programme.desc: Gorunur kalarak fark edilmez olmak, bocekler, balıklar ve yuzergezer turlerin hayatta kalmasına yardımcı olabilir. Hayvanların, uyarıcı ve rahatsız edici renkler, taklit yetenekleri ve aktif kamuflaj gibi çeşitli gorunmezlik tekniklerinin tum ayrıntılarını oğrenin.

programme.title: Bizim Gibi Hayvanlar
programme.desc: Kenyada aslan yavrularını yetiştirmek için neden butun bir koyun çalışması gerektiğini keşfedin ve Madagaskardaki kokulu lemurların çiftleşme stratejisini koklayarak keşfedin. Bir bal arısı dans partisinde kurtlarınızı dokun, ardından çatal kuyruklu bir drongonun diğer kuşları kaldırarak akşam yemeklerini nasıl çaldığını dinleyin.

programme.title: Bizim Gibi Hayvanlar
programme.desc: Kopekbalıklarının dişlerinin inci beyazlığını korumalarına yardımcı olan dişlek balıklara hayran kalın ve yunus ailelerinin kendilerine ozgu çağrılarını keşfedin. Kapuçin maymunlarının fındık kıran taş aletlerini inceleyin, zurafalar birbirine sokulurken içiniz ısınsın ve bir mirket gangsteriyle tanışın.

programme.title: Zambiyanın Yabani Yuzu
programme.desc: Luangwa Vadisinde bir babun grubuna ev sahipliği yapan bir abanoz ağaçları korusu bulunur. Ancak burada tehlikeler de vardır. Buranın sakini olan leopar, diğer avcıların aksine, guçlu ve ağaçlara tırmanacak kadar esnektir. Bu duşmandan kaçmak kolay değildir.

programme.title: Kopekbalığı Gezegeni
programme.desc: Dunyadaki en olumsuz koşullarda gelişmelerini sağlayan olağanustu yeteneklere sahip bir dizi kopekbalığını takip edin. Dondurucu Arktik sularında yaşam için yaratılmış neredeyse kor Gronland kopekbalıklarını ve karada yuruyebilen başka bir turu gozlemleyin.

programme.title: Öldurmek İçin Hazır
programme.desc: Yırtıcıların avlanırkenki kurnazlık, çeviklik ve hız gibi zekice yontemlerine, cezbetme davranışlarına tanık olun ve bazı katillerin duzlukte nasıl saklandığını, diğerlerinin ise akşam yemeği için silah veya kimyasal savaşı kullandığını gorun.

programme.title: Muson Adaları
programme.desc: Her yıl Asyadaki en buyuk fil topluluğu Minneriya Ulusal Parkında toplanmaktadır. İşte bu kutsal yerde, bebek Loka doğdu. Ailesini oluşturan devler karmaşası arasında emzirmeyi, yuzmeyi ve hortumunu kullanmayı oğrenmesini izleyin.

programme.title: Uçlardaki Afrika
programme.desc: Guney Kurak Topraklar Afrikanın guneyinin en ucra kesimlerindeki en susuz ve uç noktalardaki şartlara sahip bolgelere olan bir yolculuk. İnanılmaz derecede dayanıklı canlıları bulmak ve hayatta kalma sırlarını oğrenmek için, neredeyse hiç yağmur yağmayan, muhteşem ancak tehlikelerle dolu bir yere gidiyoruz. En buyuk memelilerden en hızlı boceklere ve hatta dunyanın başka hiçbir yerinde bulunmayan, hayalet benzeri balıklara kadar, Guney Kurak Topraklar olağanustu sakinlere ev sahipliği yapar. Bu canlılar, dunyanın en zorlu yaşam alanlarından birinde yaşamanın gunluk zorluklarıyla birbirine bağlıdır.

programme.title: Bizim Gibi Hayvanlar
programme.desc: Kenyada aslan yavrularını yetiştirmek için neden butun bir koyun çalışması gerektiğini keşfedin ve Madagaskardaki kokulu lemurların çiftleşme stratejisini koklayarak keşfedin. programme.title: Yavru Kampı
programme.desc: Yasmine ve Yara ile yağmurun ve tırmanmanın keyfini yaşayın ve Winstonın yeni havuzuna dalışını izleyin. Roger ve Steve ile duşen telsiz tasmalarını aramaya çıkın, ardından iki yaz yavrusu grubu karşı karşıya geldiğinde neler olacağını gorun.

programme.desc: Yırtıcıların avlanırkenki kurnazlık, çeviklik ve hız gibi zekice yontemlerine, cezbetme davranışlarına tanık olun ve bazı katillerin duzlukte nasıl saklandığını, diğerlerinin ise akşam yemeği için silah veya kimyasal savaşı kullandığını gorun.

programme.title: Muson Adaları
programme.desc: Her yıl Asyadaki en buyuk fil topluluğu Minneriya Ulusal Parkında toplanmaktadır. İşte bu kutsal yerde, bebek Loka doğdu. Ailesini oluşturan devler karmaşası arasında emzirmeyi, yuzmeyi ve hortumunu kullanmayı oğrenmesini izleyin.

programme.title: Uçlardaki Afrika
programme.desc: Guney Kurak Topraklar Afrikanın guneyinin en ucra kesimlerindeki en susuz ve uç noktalardaki şartlara sahip bolgelere olan bir yolculuk. İnanılmaz derecede dayanıklı canlıları bulmak ve hayatta kalma sırlarını oğrenmek için, neredeyse hiç yağmur yağmayan, muhteşem ancak tehlikelerle dolu bir yere gidiyoruz. En buyuk memelilerden en hızlı boceklere ve hatta dunyanın başka hiçbir yerinde bulunmayan, hayalet benzeri balıklara kadar, Guney Kurak Topraklar olağanustu sakinlere ev sahipliği yapar. Bu canlılar, dunyanın en zorlu yaşam alanlarından birinde yaşamanın gunluk zorluklarıyla birbirine bağlıdır.

programme.title: Bizim Gibi Hayvanlar
programme.desc: Kenyada aslan yavrularını yetiştirmek için neden butun bir koyun çalışması gerektiğini keşfedin ve Madagaskardaki kokulu lemurların çiftleşme stratejisini koklayarak keşfedin. Bir bal arısı dans partisinde kurtlarınızı dokun, ardından çatal kuyruklu bir drongonun diğer kuşları kaldırarak akşam yemeklerini nasıl çaldığını dinleyin.

programme.title: Bizim Gibi Hayvanlar
programme.desc: Kopekbalıklarının dişlerinin inci beyazlığını korumalarına yardımcı olan dişlek balıklara hayran kalın ve yunus ailelerinin kendilerine ozgu çağrılarını keşfedin. Kapuçin maymunlarının fındık kıran taş aletlerini inceleyin, zurafalar birbirine sokulurken içiniz ısınsın ve bir mirket gangsteriyle tanışın.

programme.title: Mercan Şehri
programme.desc: Romantizmin ve goçmen yolcuların mercan resifinin ana otoyollarını doldurduğu, dalgaların altında yatan en fantastik şehri keşfedin. Aşkı arayan bir yeşil deniz kaplumbağasını izleyip yeni doğmuş yavrularına bakan baba deve kuşuna eşlik edin.

programme.title: Kopekbalığı Gezegeni
programme.desc: Dunyadaki en olumsuz koşullarda gelişmelerini sağlayan olağanustu yeteneklere sahip bir dizi kopekbalığını takip edin. Dondurucu Arktik sularında yaşam için yaratılmış neredeyse kor Gronland kopekbalıklarını ve karada yuruyebilen başka bir turu gozlemleyin.

programme.title: Öldurmek İçin Hazır
programme.desc: Yırtıcıların avlanırkenki kurnazlık, çeviklik ve hız gibi zekice yontemlerine, cezbetme davranışlarına tanık olun ve bazı katillerin duzlukte nasıl saklandığını, diğerlerinin ise akşam yemeği için silah veya kimyasal savaşı kullandığını gorun.

programme.title: Briko
programme.desc: Evimizdeki sıradan malzemelerle oyunlar uretmek, oyuncaklar yapmak mumkun. Briko ile her bolumde onlarca yaratıcı fikri hayata geçirmeyi, kullanışlı eşyalar yapmayı ve gundelik eşyalara farklı bir gozle bakmayı oğreniyoruz. En yakın arkadaşı Hepi ile birlikte çeşitli objelerden birbirinden eğlenceli oyuncaklar yapan Briko, hayal gucumuzu ve el becerimizi geliştirmemize de yardımcı olacak. “Kendin Yap” konsepti uzerine kurulmuş Briko’da boş bir yumurta kutusunun bir gozluğe ya da bir saksıya donuşmesi mumkun.

Bu macerada Oscar’ın şanssızlığı yemek ve su arayan tek kişinin o olmaması... Tilki Popy, Sırtlan Harchi ve Akbaba Buck da aynı arayışın içinde ve çelimsiz Kertenkele Oscar’a kıyasla biraz daha guçluler.
